bill.summary:
This bill provides for a Congressional Gold Medal to be awarded posthumously to Carrie Beatrice "Mudear" Sager in recognition of her service to her community and nation for peace, racial justice, and human rights.
Following the award the medal shall be given to the Smithsonian Institution and be available for display at the National Museum of African American History and Culture.
